name: Unidentified_Pantoran_(Cid%27s_Parlor)
content: A Pantoran male was present in Cid's Parlor in 19 BBY, where he played against Omega in a game of dejarik, watched by a small crowd. During the game, the Pantoran used his Kintan strider to knock out Omega's K'lor'slug. However, his opponent used her monnok to take out his Kintan strider and Mantellian Savrip, winning the match. After his defeat, the Pantoran walked away from the gaming table with dismay. The Pantoran had blue eyes, unlike most members of his species whose eyes were yellow.
